snippet.title: Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side 2nd Kiss Opening
snippet.description:
This is the opening sequence for a Playstation 2 Dating Simulation Game called "Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side 2nd Kiss."

As a response to the overwhelming popularity of the first Tokimemo Girl's Side game, Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side 2nd Kiss was released in 2006.

In Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side 2nd Kiss, female players make their way through three years of high school, while trying to attract a male character from a pool of dateable characters. The game play focuses mainly on scheduling, dating, and stat-building. The player is able to go shopping for clothes and accessories to wear on dates. If the player is successful at wooing a male character by the end of the third year, then she will receive a confession of love along with that character's special ending.

Music:
"Stay" by Yuuichi Ooura

For Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side 2 images, music, and more, visit our website at http://www.tokimekimedia.net

Follow us on Twitter!
http://www.twitter.com/tokimekimedia

DISCLAIMER: We do NOT own the content of this video. It is property of Konami.
